#summary Roadmap of this project

= Introduction =

This application is written for Android.
It should help to organize a meeting and exchange documents beforehand.


== version 0.0.1 ==
Allows to define a date, start and end time and view people with id in (1,2,3). Makes use of the People Content Provider, DatePickerDialog and TimePickerDialog.
